titles: Certe[n] godly, learned, and comfortable conferences, betwene the two reuerende fathers, and holye martyrs of Christe, D. Nicolas Rydley late Bysshoppe of London, and M. Hughe Latymer sometyme Bysshoppe of Worcester, during the tyme of their emprysonmentes. Whereunto is added. A treatise agaynst the errour of transubstantiation, made by the sayd reuerende father D. Nicolas Rydley. M.D.LVI.
author: Ridley, Nicholas, 1500?-1555.
Latimer, Hugh, 1485?-1555. aut
Ridley, Nicholas, 1500?-1555. Brief declaracion of the Lordes Supper. aut
publisher: Printed by the heirs of W. Rihel,
notes: "A treatise against the errour of transubstantiation" is a reprint of Ridley's: A brief declaracion of the Lordes Supper.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
